snippet: Shiv Kumar Yadav, the cabdriver accused of raping a female passenger in New Delhi over the weekend, was free on bail in at least three other serious criminal cases, the police said.
abstract: Police say Shiv Kumar Yadav, Uber cabdriver accused of raping a female passenger in New Delhi, is free on bail in at least three other serious criminal cases.

byline.original: By NIDA NAJAR and SUHASINI RAJ

lead_paragraph: Shiv Kumar Yadav, the cabdriver accused of raping a female passenger in New Delhi over the weekend, was free on bail in at least three other serious criminal cases, the police said.

headline.main: Uber Driver in India, Accused of Rape, Faces Other Charges
headline.print_headline: Uber Driver in India, Accused of Rape, Faces Other Charges
